objects.name: TutorialText
objects.string:
Score points by knocking marbles out of the ring using your shooter marble!

In order to shoot your marble, either hold down on the touchscreen and drag it away from your marble, or click on the screen.
The arrow shows you the direction your shot will go, and it's length and color indicates how strong the shot will be.

If your marble flies out of the ring, you can place it anywhere around the border and take your shot from there. You can keep taking turns until you fail to knock a marble out of the ring.

Each marble is worth one point. Score more than the opponent to win!

content.text:
Score points by knocking marbles out of the ring using your shooter marble!

In order to shoot your marble, either hold down on the touchscreen and drag it away from your marble, or click on the screen.
The arrow shows you the direction your shot will go, and it's length and color indicates how strong the shot will be.

If your marble flies out of the ring, you can place it anywhere around the border and take your shot from there. You can keep taking turns until you fail to knock a marble out of the ring.

Each marble is worth one point. Score more than the opponent to win!

objects.name: ExitPromptText
objects.string:
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
You will be able to restart at any time.

content.text:
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
You will be able to restart at any time.

inlineCode: window.addEventListener("pointerdown", e => { // js method for determining input type
runtimeScene.getVariables().get("isUsingTouchscreen").setBoolean(e.pointerType == "touch"); // This distinguishes between touch and mouse input
}, { passive: true }); // This is for performance reasons

parameters: clamp(0, (DistanceBetweenPositions(inputX, inputY, PlayerMarble.X(), PlayerMarble.Y()) - shotDistanceOffset)*chargeScale, maxCharge)
